Experience.title: Software Engineer
Experience.description:
- Deployed Local Active Monitoring to supervise the activity of Microsoft 365 daemon and
logged the availability of Exchange Mailbox Replication service to disk.
- Collected 2.6 billion records of service disruption information on Azure and analyzed those records to construct a Power BI dashboard to showcase recent unhealthy clusters.
- Automated ETL process with ADF task flow, which incrementally refreshes the intermediate data table on Azure Data Factory and reduces materialization time from 2 hours to 13 minutes.
